jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our growing team...
requirements: 3+ years of experience in web development
Proficiency in JavaScript, React, and Node.js
Experience with database design and ORM tools
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail

jobs.title: Renewable Energy Engineer
jobs.description: Join our team of passionate engineers working on cutting-edge renewable energy projects...
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering
2+ years of experience in renewable energy projects
Knowledge of solar and wind energy systems
Strong analytical and project management skills
